title: BRIEF-EPAM Acquires Continuum
text: March 15, 2018 / 5:41 PM / Updated 11 minutes ago BRIEF-EPAM Acquires Continuum March 15 (Reuters) - EPAM Systems Inc: * EPAM ACQUIRES CONTINUUM, EXPANDING GLOBAL INNOVATION, DESIGN AND PHYSICAL PRODUCT DEVELOPMENT CAPABILITIES * EPAM SYSTEMS INC - ‍NOW EXPECTS REVENUE GROWTH FOR FULL YEAR 2018 TO BE AT LEAST 26% REPORTED​ * EPAM SYSTEMS INC - ‍GAAP EPS FOR FULL YEAR TO NOW BE AT LEAST $3.36 AND NON-GAAP DILUTED EPS TO NOW BE AT LEAST $4.07​ * EPAM SYSTEMS INC - ‍ADJUSTMENTS TO ITS 2018 OUTLOOK RELATE SOLELY TO IMPACT OF CONTINUUM ACQUISITION​ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
